revised_title: Effective Viscosity of Suspensions of Spherical Particles: A Mathematical Approach
tldr: This article presents a mathematical method to calculate the effective viscosity of suspensions of spherical particles in a fluid. The study focuses on low concentrations and uses a statistical model to determine the fluid velocity and pressure distribution. The results provide a better understanding of the behavior of suspensions and can be applied to other non-spherical particles as well.
